Reviews.Title: Mobile Watch
Reviews.Author: Prabhuramsingh
Reviews.Content: Though the size of the Watch is a bit bigger than the usual ones, the Item received in order with it's accessories and works perfectly! I had small problem with the pairing of Bluetooth Earpiece with the Phone, but with a very quick support from the Seller, i managed to pair them. Appreciate Seller's after sales service!

Reviews.Title: unlike a cell phone
Reviews.Author: loveskagen
Reviews.Content: unable to dial numbers ... its for users who has a lot of patience just to try pressing numbers. The screen is way too small.Products as small as these should be made to speak into not try to dial.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Shy
Reviews.Content: The blue tooth is very cheap.  The watch looks great.  Texting is difficult and would better be suited with a stylus.  Desperately needs a speaker function that you can turn up and actually hear for driving and so forth, as I said, the blue tooth sucks and broke on the first day.  I would rate this a 5 if I could hear better when not using a blue tooth instead of hold the watch next to my ear!

Reviews.Title: Great Gift for anyone
Reviews.Author: Annie
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my 10 year old son for his birthday! Of course he loves it, what kid wouldn't want his first cell phone on his wrist. It works well and does everything that's expected, calls, text messages etc. However it's a pretty big watch for a small wrist especially a kid, and you might want to consider buying a stylus pen to type with. It's quite difficult to type with any sized finger. Other than that a decent buy for the price.

Reviews.Title: soon order a next one
Reviews.Author: Andrew Rhoden
Reviews.Content: Excellent I think it worth the money  all my friends love it although idid not get the pencil for the touch screen

Reviews.Title: It not last long
Reviews.Author: Roysian
Reviews.Content: It broke. Everything works until one day touch screen stop working. I took out sim, battery still didn't work. It need development.

Reviews.Title: Problem understanding instructions
Reviews.Author: Anna Davila
Reviews.Content: I like the watch very much, but the instruction booklet should be more detailed. It took me the longest to figure out how it works. I still don't understand it fully.

Reviews.Title: The best!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Rachel A Davis
Reviews.Content: I recommended this watch to everyone I could. The price is right and it makes more sense than buying watch that has to be near the phone to work. My son loves it!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good Item
Reviews.Author: Joe Lopez
Reviews.Content: Great item for the price can not go wrong , I will recommend this item to any one who needs it

Reviews.Title: It was so nice working.....
Reviews.Author: soyoung  kim
Reviews.Content: My son lost his smart phone.My son said "mom, how about watch phone?"So I read all review and then I boughtthis phone. It was so nice working. We use T-mobile prepaid card. Because next summer we will return my country.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unlocked GSM Quad Band 850/900/1800/1900MHz - Gets coverage on 4 bandwidths for clear reception in most geographical regions
Make and receive calls directly from the watch phone itself with the built-in MIC and speaker, or even the included wireless Bluetooth Earphone
MP3/MP4 player, FM radio- Pick up your favorite FM radio stations wherever you are
1.5 inch TFT touchscreen w/ Stylus | Built-in Spy Camera & Video Recorder | FREE Bluetooth Headset - support handsfree calls & music
Package Included 1 x Watch Cell Phone, 1 x Lithium Rechargeable Battery, 1 x Bluetooth Earphone, 1 x USB Cable, 1 x A/C Adapter (US Plug), 1 x User Manual
ProductInfo.Name: Unlocked! GSM Touch Screen Watch Phone w/ Free Bluetooth Headset [aT&T / T-Mobile]
